data.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
data.description: Lead developer responsible for architecting and implementing scalable web applications using React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Managed a team of 4 developers and collaborated with product managers to deliver high-quality solutions.
achievements: Increased application performance by 40% through optimization strategies
Led successful migration of legacy systems to modern tech stack
Mentored 6 junior developers and improved team productivity by 25%
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 60%

data.title: Master of Science in Computer Science
data.description: Specialized in Software Engineering and Machine Learning. Completed thesis on 'Optimizing React Application Performance through Advanced Rendering Techniques'. Graduated Magna Cum Laude with GPA 3.8/4.0.
achievements: Magna Cum Laude graduate with 3.8/4.0 GPA
Published research paper on React performance optimization
Teaching Assistant for Advanced Web Development course
Winner of Best Student Project Award for thesis work

data.title: Open Source Contributor
data.description: Active contributor to various open source projects including React ecosystem libraries, developer tools, and educational resources. Maintained several NPM packages with over 10k weekly downloads.
achievements: Maintained 3 NPM packages with 10k+ weekly downloads
Spoke at 5 tech conferences about open source development
Mentored 20+ new contributors through GitHub and Discord
